description:
Princess Kakyu perishes after being defeated by Galaxia. Devastated, the Sailor Star Lights go after Galaxia to avenge their fallen princess. Meanwhile, Sailor Moon and the rest of the Guardians also prepare for their last battle to protect the galaxy.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Countdown to Destruction: The Sailor Guardians` Last Battle
Cuando la Galaxia desaparece. La última batalla de las Guerreros.
Ginga Horobirutoki! Sailor Senshi Saigo no Tatakai
銀河滅びる時! S戦士最後の戦い
